title.rendered: Save Time and Seize Opportunity with Marketing Automation

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow //gradient-lt-dk-gray-with-ss-while-logo” css=”.vc_custom_1589928570441{margin-bottom: 9rem !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1561135322185{margin-right: 10% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Find out how Xposure Creative partnered with SharpSpring to help a client streamline their disjointed marketing efforts, resulting in more than 300% more new leads in just 48 hours.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1597858628616{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]When digital marketing agency Xposure Creative’s client, Tick King, was forced to move their business online due to COVID-19, they needed help managing their disorganized marketing channels and locating new revenue streams. In response, Xposure Creative teamed up with SharpSpring and delivered results, fast.

Check out our brand new case study on Xposure Creative and discover how they used SharpSpring marketing automation to:

  • Easily target existing Tick King customers via email and gained a 327% increase in new inquiries in just 2 days
  • Cut Tick King’s advertising spending by £400 a month
  • Revamp the Tick King website to significantly improve their SEO – resulting in a 143% site traffic increase

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

excerpt.rendered: Learn how one business used SharpSpring marketing automation to streamline its lead qualification process and re-engage cold leads—while increasing site traffic by 200%.
